data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The most noticeable feature of my hometown is its long coastal line with clean beaches. In my childhood, I often swam in the sea and collect shells with my friends. In recent years, the beaches in my city have been awarded the most suitable place for surfing, which boots its reputation further. The beaches here are famous not only nationally but also attract visitors from worldwide. There are several quality resorts built around to offer a better visiting experience. A range of cafés, restaurants, shops serving local and exotic products are available there. I can also see couples who are taking wedding pictures there. Since last year, the government has built up a path for walking which connects most of the beaches. Moreover, there are markets with various themes every certain period. Especially on Christmas Eve and New year's Eve, there are great fireworks displays along the beaches. (148字)
data.referenceText: What is the most noticeable feature of your town or city?
data.referenceTranslate: 你家乡最引人注目的特点是什么？
